entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning late this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
